author: jo-shva
name: DeLorean_Noir_Cinnamon
description:
A Carbon-Fiber Styled Theme.

Check out the full theme package at: http://fav.me/d4kltn2

REQUIRED:

1. Imagemagick

2. Cinnamon 1.2 or newer

    **Designed for Cinnamon 1.4.1

INSTALL:  

1.  cd to the directory and run the START.sh script.  Or double-click the START.sh script and choose RUN IN TERMINAL.  Follow the instructions in terminal.

2.  Lastly copy the containing folder to either ~/.themes/ or for system-wide installation /usr/share/themes/

***If you do not run the START.sh script the panels will not be visible.

CHANGE-LOG:

  • vers 1.4.0 - First version
  • vers 1.4.4 - Updated for Cinnamon-1.3.1. Fixed the lag when hovering in the menu. Changed volume-popup. Fixed an issue with text bouncing while hovering in popup menu. Added the vers 1.3.1 Panel Drag n Drop color Highlighting.  And changed the model-dialog button(for if/when they are implimented).
  • vers 1.5.1 - Updated for Cinnamon-1.4.1.  A COMPLETE REVAMP!  From Dash to panel.  Fixed many bugs, to numerous to list. 
  • vers 1.5.2 - Finished the theme Rework.  The Diag boxes are now steel.  Many fixes and changes.
  • vers 1.5.3 - Volume Slider Fixed, .popup-submenu-menu-item:open Fixed, Some improvements for LookingGlass, lightened the Window-list-item box, Dialog unfocused-Entry Fixed and, favorites-button Fixed the border.
  • vers 1.5.5 - Fixed the jumpy right margin when hovering in the menu box.  Cleaned up the text in Dialog-Boxes, and a few other fixes and polishes.
